title: Mahou To Boku To Dekkai Shishou
alternative_title: and My Big Master! ; Magic ; Magic, Me, and My Big Master! ; Mahou to Boku to Dekkai Shishou ; Me ; 魔法と僕とでっかい師匠 ; 魔法与我与伟大的师父
status: and My Big Master! ; Magic ; Magic, Me, and My Big Master! ; Mahou to Boku to Dekkai Shishou ; Me ; 魔法と僕とでっかい師匠 ; 魔法与我与伟大的师父
description:
Description :
        Hinata, who longs to be a wizard, heads to the mansion of a "Cursed Eye Witch" who can control people's hearts at will. What appeared there was Esmeralda, a terrifying witch with a huge body that made you look up at her. However, her true identity is a shy witch who loves Hinata so much that she can't help it!!A romantic comedy between master and student that will make your heart flutter due to the height difference and the gap between the witch and her disciple.
